options: Tanga inzira ku binyabiziga byamaze kwinjira aho banyura bazunguruka
Tanga inzira gusa niba uri munzira ya kabiri niya gatatu isohoka
Komeza kuko abandi bayobozi b'ibinyabiziga bagomba kuguha inzira yo gukomeza
question: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yakora iki igihe ageze aho banyura bazenguruka?

options: Guhindukira cyangwa kujya mu kindi gice cy' umuhanda
question: Umurongo ucagaguye uvuga ko buri muyobozi abujijwe kuwurenga uretse mu gihe:

options: A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Icyemezo cy'Isuzuma ry'ikinyabiziga kimara igihe kingana iki?

options: Gushushanya aho zagonganiye no kuzishyira kuruhande
Gukuramo abagenze ugashyiraho icyapa cya mpandeshatu girukura kumodoka
Gutegereza ko abapolisi bahagera mbere yo gukura ibinyabiziga mu muhanda
Guhagarika ibindi binyabiziga kugeza ikibazo gikemutse mukabona kubikura mu  muhanda
question: Niki umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yakora igihe agize uruhare mu mpanuka yo mu  muhanda , aho ntawakometese ariko ibinyabiziga bikaba byateza icyago cyangwa  byafunze umuhanda ?

options: kucyinyuraho ukoresheje uruhande urwo arirwo rwose
question: Utwaye ikinyabiziga mu muhanda ufite ibyerekezo bibiri .ikinyabiziga imbere yawe  cyiragenda buhoro, imbere yawe umuhanda nta kibazo kunyuranaho, ugomba
Abanyamaguru ntibashobora gutinda mu muhanda cyangwa kuhahagarara cyeretse  habaye iki?
Imburira zimurika zemerewe gukoreshwa kugirango bamenyeshe umuyobozi ko  bagiye kumunyuraho aha hakurikira:
Isonga y'impombo yohereza ibyotsi ntishobora kwerekezwa aha hakurikira
Icyapa kitwa Ntihanyurwa mu byerekezo byombi gifite ubuso bw'amabara akurikira

options: Iyo umuhanda umurikiwe umuyobozi ashobora kubona muri metero 20
Iyo ikinyabiziga kigiye kubisikana ni ibindi
question: Amatara maremarey' ikinyabiziga agomba kuzimwa mu bihe bikurikira :

options: abanyamaguru bashaka guhagarara akanya gato igihe bambukiranya umuhanda
question: Abanyamaguru batatanye cyangwa bagize udutsiko tudafatanyije gahunda kandi  batanayobowe n'umwarimu bategetswe kunyura mu tuyira turi ku mpande  z'umuhanda no ku nkengero zigiye hejuru uretse ubutaka butsindagiye butandukanya  imihanda ibiri bwo kunyurwamo gusa n'aba bakurikira:
Ijambo “inzira y'ibinyabiziga” risobanuye iki?

options: Birabujijwe ku binyabiziga bitwara abakozi ba leta
Birabujijwe ku binyabiziga by'abikorera ki giti cyabo
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?

options: Ibinyabiziga n'abanyamaguru bivuye mu muhanda agendamo
Abanyamaguru bambukiranya umuhanda avuyemo cyangwa uwo aganamo
question: Mu gihe ahindura icyerekezo umuyobozi wese agomba kubigira agabanije umuvuduko  kandi akareka hagahita iki?

Usibye ibinyabiziga by'ingabo z'Igihugu, Ikinyabiziga kigendeshwa na moteri kiriho  ibyuma ntamenwa cyangwa ikindi cyose gituma gikoreshwa mu gutera cyangwa mu  kwitabara ntigishobora kugenda mu nzira nyabagendwa kidafite uruhushya rwihariye.  Urwo ruhushya rutangwa naba bakurikira:

options: Ipikipiki ifite akanyabiziga kometse ku ruhande rwayo
question: Ubugari bwa romoruki ntiburenza ubugari bw'ikinyabiziga kiyikurura iyo ikuruwe  n'ibinyabiziga bikurikira:

options: Bifasha umuyobozi wa romoruki kukurebera mundorerwamo.
question: Mugihe ukurikiranye na romoruki, n'ukubera iki ugomba gusiga umwanya uhagije  hagati yawe nayo?
Ahatari mu nsisiro umuvuduko ntarengwa mu isaha wa velomoteri ni:

options: Cyerekana ko hamanuka ku kigero cya 10% ugereranyije n'ahantu hazamuka  cyane mu Rwanda
Cyerekana akamanuko gashobora guteza ibyago mu kigereranyo cya 10%
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?

options: Yakoresha amatara magufi n'amaremare aburira abari imbere ko agiye kwinjira  mu isangano
Arategereza abageze mu isangano bakabanza gutambuka
question: Ni gute umuyobozi yakwinjira muri iri sangano?
